name: Mecha Mayor
description:
NOTE:  If buttons aren't working on the title screen refreshing the browser usually works. 

Protect your HQ and build a prosperous town to become the best Mecha Mayor ever!!

WASD controls

E confirm

Q Build/cancel

Space Fires

Protect your HQ -it's hp and max hp are shown below it -it can be healed by hovering over it or by buying the HQ Auto Regen upgrade from the upgrade shop

Upgrade shop -build an upgrade shop anywhere to use it to shop for upgrades for your mech and HQ

Hearts- spend hearts to heal your HQ

Coins - Collect Coins from Enemies or from buildings that generate coins

Build Strategically to boost the output of Buildings via Neighbor Bonuses

made for kaiju minijam

Art, music, and programming by Chase of Bass

palette is eulbink by inkpendude
font: PF arma five and pixel operator
